snippet: As an Obama adviser, Valerie Jarrett, exited a Bloomberg breakfast panel, a reporter from the celebrity-stalking Web site TMZ shouted out the most surprising question of the morning, hand-held video camera at the ready.
abstract: As an Obama adviser, Valerie Jarrett, exited a Bloomberg breakfast panel, a reporter from the celebrity-stalking Web site TMZ shouted out the most surprising question of the morning, hand-held video camera at the ready.

headline.main: A TMZ Moment at the Democratic Convention
